name: Wobbilcious
description:
Welcome to Wobbilicious, the best (and only) jelly cafe in town!

Artisan jelly-craft is in decline, all the traditional jelly making techniques have been tossed aside for the age of machines. You're the only person left to look after the cafe and make the orders. Made for the 2019 lowrezjam! 

Please share your hi-score mine is 610!

How to Play

Movement - Use the arrow keys!

Use Machine/Object - Press X

Just set the plates onto the conveyor belt and mix the jelly you need to satisfy the order! Use the boxing glove on the right to serve the jelly and the boxing glove on the left to dispose.
